description:
Kyosuke and Madoka get a photo of a UFO they saw. Shortly thereafter, Kyosuke finds out it was his sisters using their power, but he can`t tell Madoka that, even as others accuse her of making it all up.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ci credi? non ci credi? Madoka ha visto un Ufo
Shinjiru Shinjinai UFO o Mita Madoka
Well, do You Believe it or Not? Madoka Saw an UFO
信じる信じないUFOを見たまどか
